title: Ineligible duo partner
body: I dont understand this ineligible duo partner me and my friend want to duo im gold 5 and he is silver 2 last season when the ranked reset i was not able to invite him to duo with me cause it was ineligible but then i saw one of my other friends who was silver 4-5 last year eligible to play with me ? wut?

replies.body: It should be eligible. If you're unranked, but played last season, then your rank from that season will be used to determine your eligibility to duo with other people. Were you able to play with this person before the reset in ranked?
